subtitle: Chipolata sausages with a mustardy dip.

method.text: Soak wooden skewers (allow 2 per person). Preheat grill to medium.
Place the chipolatas on a grill pan and grill for 10-15 min or until cooked, turning over halfway.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, mustard and seasoning. Spoon into serving bowls.
Thread 3 cooked chipolatas onto each skewer. Finish off each with a cherry tomato. Repeat until all the sausages are on skewers.
